20.m: For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, not a result of works, so that no one may boast. - Ephesians 2:8 (ESV)

l.q: What is man's spiritual condition and what caused this spiritual condition?
l.a: Our trespasses and sins and disobedience to God caused us to be spiritually dead.

l.q: How did God made manifest His love for us?
l.a: God made us alive in Christ.

l.q: How does a person attain salvation?
l.a: A person is saved by God's grace through faith. It is not by works.

l.q: What did God purposed for us to do?
l.a: We are God's workmanship, created in Christ to do good works.
